Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 49th overall pick, by California in 1991...
Injured on 8/1/1991 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 5 days...
Injured on 4/11/1993 with a Strained Hip Muscle, out for 6 days...
Injured on 8/25/1994 with a Inflamed Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 7/12/1995 with a Pulled Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from California to Pittsburgh on 1/31/1996 (Going to PIT: 1B G. Colbrunn, RF T. Womack. Going to CAL: P B. Taylor)...
Had first career hit on 7/14/1996, off Bill C. Swift (CHC)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/2/1996, off Jack Armstrong (LA)...
Won World Series with Pittsburgh in 1996...
